game.name: Cam and Leon Donut Hop
game.description:
Opting to play flying games online is a great fun for many. If you also want to explore the blue sky through your intense flying skills, Cam and Leon Donut Hop game is just for you. Introduced by the creatures of a popular 3D animation, this brand new adventure challenge has a lot to keep you glued to the screen. It will be amazing and highly exciting to play with the two funny and cute characters while looking forward to hop their way around the park. 

Be prepared to hop in and out of donuts to boost your score! Do not forget to collect coins that you see on the moving screen while avoiding the obstacles. Start your game by clicking the screen on desktop or tapping the screen on mobile phone! Get extra points and enjoy new features by collecting power ups! Earn bonus points to do a clean dip and you can also unlock new skins by obtaining high scores! This cool html5 fly game features increasing challenging obstacles and interactive tutorial. 

You will have plenty of opportunities to unlock new characters when you progress. Use your coins to buy new characters like Pepper Shaker, Ice Cube, Ladybird and Leon! Lots of engaging moments will be there to keep you engrossed. Check out more funny and flappy endless jumping games for kids on atmegame.com!! Get ready to improve your cognitive and brainteaser skills in our free physics games! Good luck to hop in a better environment, no download required!!
